Kon'nichiwa 👋!

I'm Aditya Vivek Thota, a software engineer with 6 years of experience in React, Next.js, Node.js, TypeScript, Python, and Applied AI.

As a tech-agnostic professional, I quickly adapt to any tech stack or framework.

I’m also a seasoned technical writer with 150+ articles on AI, deep learning, and software engineering.

Here’s a snapshot of my recent work.

🚀 Projects

  • AutoProject [GitHub]: Your ultimate BYOK tool to automate product and project management with AI-powered workflows. Tech: Svelte, SvelteKit, TailwindCSS, Vercel's AI SDK

  • TechFlix [Live Demo]: A tech content aggregation platform summarizing 150+ engineering blogs, research journals and news sources on a single feed. Tech: Python, Svelte, SvelteKit, MongoDB

  • PicToWebP [GitHub]: A blazingly fast, lightweight bulk image to WebP converter that can help you save over 90% of disk space. Tech: Python, Flask, Image Processing, Rust

  • PromptGPT Pro [Live Demo] [README]: A custom GPT designed to craft creative, concise prompts with self-improving feedback loops. Tech: Prompt Engineering, ChatGPT

👨‍💻 A little more about my work experience


  • 💼 Senior Software Engineer, Visa Inc [Present – May 2022]

    • Leading UI/UX for a new enterprise-scale horizontal platform – owning frontend architecture across a form builder, renderer, SDK, RBAC, and IAM tools using React 18, Next.js 14 (App Router), and Visa’s internal design system.

    • Upgraded VDCS UI to React 18 with functional components and Redux Toolkit, streamlining 110+ UI screens.

    • Migrated VDCS batch jobs to internal Hadoop, cutting external dependencies and software licensing costs.

  • 💻 Software Engineer, Visa Inc [May 2022 – July 2019]

    • Enhanced VDCS accessibility to meet latest WCAG standards.

    • Improved monitoring and alerting for batch jobs, boosting reliability.

    • Built multiple config features (DAF, Apple Pay, etc.) as a full-stack engineer.

  • 🛠️ Solopreneur, 0 to 1 Projects [Present – July 2019]

    • 🚀 AutoProject [GitHub]

      • Automate your project management with AI-powered PRD → user stories → tasks.

      • Seamless Linear integration.

      • Secure setup via Docker Compose.

    • 🤖 TechFlix [Live Demo]

      • 150+ Tech Blogs & 15+ Journals curated into a clean, AI-summarized feed.

      • Powered by SvelteKit, Python, and LM Studio.

    • 🌈 AltCSS [GitHub]

      • Class-less, lightweight CSS component library.

      • Experimental, offbeat take on pushing pure CSS to its limits.

      • Published to NPM – use via bun add altcss.

    • 🖼️➡️🌐 PicToWebP [GitHub]

      • Bulk image → WebP converter built in Python to save up to 90% disk space.

      • Also includes a Rust version for benchmarking.

      • Multithreaded, with detailed reporting and instant folder conversion.

      • Read blog for backstory & usage.

  • 📝 Editor in Chief, The Research Nest [Present – Nov 2017]

    • Run a STEM publication on Medium, scaling from 0 → 1K followers and 7K+ monthly views organically. Currently building theresearchnest.com.

  • 🔵 Top Voice, LinkedIn [Present – Nov 2020]

    • Recognized as one of India’s original Top 20 LinkedIn Voices (2020) – youngest recipient. Grew to 53K+ followers and 4M+ annual impressions – 100% organic. No clickbait, shady growth hacks.

  • ✍️ Team Lead, Writing Program, Qrius [Jun 2019 – May 2018]

    • Led flagship writing program delivering to 12M+ monthly readers. Managed editorial ops, performance, and content innovation.

  • 📚 Head of Content, Probe (NIT Trichy) [Jun 2019 – Jun 2018]

    • Led 20+ member team and initiated the Probe blog on Medium. Launched Alumni Corner, Semester in a Nutshell, and Interview Series (featuring Tanmay Bakshi, Balaji Viswanathan, etc.).
